description: Developer blacklist configuration for model filtering and FLOP capping

01 AI.reason: Chinese AI company founded by Kai-Fu Lee, relatively new but has some disclosure

AI21 Labs.reason: Israeli AI company with reasonable disclosure standards, academic backing

Alibaba.reason: Major Chinese tech company with established AI research division, reasonable disclosure

Amazon.reason: Major tech company with established AI research and disclosure practices

Anthropic.reason: AI safety focused company with good disclosure practices and research transparency

ByteDance.reason: Chinese tech company with limited transparency on AI model training specifics - Limited disclosure on training methodology and data sources for frontier models

Cohere.reason: Canadian AI company with reasonable disclosure standards and research focus

Databricks.reason: Open source focused company with transparent model development practices

DeepSeek.reason: Chinese AI company with good research publication record and model specifications

Google.reason: Major tech company with established AI research division and disclosure practices

Meta.reason: Major tech company with open source AI models and good disclosure practices

Microsoft.reason: So far they are not generating large proprietary models

MiniMax.reason: Chinese AI company with very limited transparency on model specifications - Insufficient disclosure on training methodology, data sources, and model architecture

Mistral.reason: French AI company with reasonable disclosure standards and research focus

Moonshot.reason: Chinese AI startup with limited public disclosure on model training details - Minimal transparency on training compute, data sources, and methodology

NexusFlow.reason: AI company with focus on open models and reasonable disclosure practices

Nvidia.reason: Major tech company with established AI research and good disclosure practices

OpenAI.reason: Leading AI company with reasonable disclosure standards for frontier models

OpenChat.reason: Open source project with transparent development practices

Reka AI.reason: AI company with research focus and reasonable disclosure practices

Snowflake.reason: Data platform company with transparent model development practices

StepFun.reason: Chinese AI company with very limited public information on model training - Extremely limited disclosure on training compute, methodology, and specifications

Tencent.reason: Major Chinese tech company but with limited transparency on AI model training specifics - Limited disclosure on training methodology and compute for frontier AI models

Unknown.reason: Models with unidentified developers cannot be properly evaluated - Cannot verify training methodology or model provenance

xAI.reason: Elon Musk's AI company with some disclosure on model development

Zhipu.reason: Chinese AI company with limited transparency on model training details - Insufficient disclosure on training compute and methodology

Zhipu AI.reason: Chinese AI company (same as Zhipu) with limited transparency on model training details - Insufficient disclosure on training compute and methodology

Ai2.reason: TestOrg has good disclosure practices for research purposes

Cognitive Computations.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

HuggingFace.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

InternLM.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

MosaicML.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

Nomic AI.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

OpenAssistant.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

RWKV.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

Stanford.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

Together AI.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

UC Berkeley.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

Upstage AI.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

Pika Labs.reason: Insufficient disclosure on training methodology and specifications

settings.cap_reasoning_template: FLOP estimate capped at {cap_value:.1e} due to developer blacklist policy: {reason}

blacklist_criteria: Limited or no disclosure on training methodology
Insufficient transparency on compute resources used
No clear documentation of data sources or training process
